channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Managers are puzzled by Gen Zers as giving feedback becomes a lost art in the era of the 'coddled mind'
item.description: We may have lost sight of the old saying, 'Prepare the child for the road, not the road for the child.'

item.title: Turkey's inflation passes 75% in what economists believe is peak
item.description: Inflation in Turkey topped 75% in May in what economists expect to be the peak before prices start to ease.

item.title: Hipgnosis Songs agrees to improved $1.58 billion takeover by Blackstone
Airbus CEO blames U.S. for trade wars rather than China in old Boeing flare-up
item.description: "I want to remind you that in recent years, it was not the Chinese who imposed tariffs on European aircraft, but the Americans,” Guillaume Faury said.

item.title: See inside Ford's new tech campus, a century-old Detroit train station restored for $950 million
item.description: Ford Chair Bill Ford Jr., who spearheaded the project, said the 30-acre campus will be key for the automaker's talent acquisition and retention.

item.title: Roaring Kitty post appears to show a big stake in GameStop
Toyota halts sales of 3 cars after submitting faulty data during pedestrian-safety tests
item.description: Toyota said shipment halts will affect two assembly lines responsible for the production of 130,000 units a year.

item.title: Atos falls 18% as embattled French IT firms weighs rescue deals set to result in 'massive dilution'
item.description: Shares in the struggling French IT firm Atos tumbled on Monday as the company said it would pick between two rescue deal options this week.

item.title: What’s worth streaming in June: ‘House of the Dragon,’ ‘The Bear’ and more
Capital One Miles: Everything you need to know in 2024
item.description: As a credit card rewards program, Capital One Miles may have too many vexing shortcomings for the average consumer—but a niche type of traveler may find it perfect.

item.title: Airlines headed for record revenue in 2024 as travel soars, but profit margins remain thin
item.description: While revenues and profits are enjoying tailwinds, expenses are also soaring, the IATA reported.

item.title: Nvidia speeds up its AI-chip roadmap, next-gen Rubin platform coming in 2026
GameStop shares jump 103% as meme stock Reddit driver DeepF— Value posted an apparent $116 million position
item.description: The June 2 screenshot by Keith Gill, who goes by DeepF— Value on Reddit, shows five million shares bought at $21.27 per share.

item.title: Digital bank Monzo posts first full year of profit after more than doubling revenue
item.description: Monzo, the British digital challenger bank, on Monday reported its first full year of profitability.

item.title: Stocks are up but investors seem ‘fragile.’ Is the bull market in early stages?
